title: Select the login button to start
content: From there you can log in or select the sign up now link to create an account.

title: Dashboard is where you'll see all the posts that you have written.
content: From there you can select a post to edit or delete as well.

title: Homepage is for everyone
content: You can see all posts from the homepage view, and will have the ability to click on a post and comment on it if you're logged in.

title: Logging out
content: You can select the logout button, alternatively you'll be logged out automatically after 10 minutes.
